title.narrative: 005 EPR - PROTECTION

description.narrative: 308/005 Institutional capacity of child protection actors and resilience of communities strengthened to prepare for and respond to all emergencies in accordance with CCCs, which contributes to Child Protection And Emergencies, Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: 308 Government, communities &civil societies in Disaster Risk Reduction (including timely life saving interventions during emergencies) respond to emergencies in Ethiopia by 2015, with particular focus on issues affecting women & children in the most vulnerable regions/districts.

mailing-address.narrative: UNICEF House (Kazanchis - Opposite UNECA/German House) P.O. Box 1169 Addis Ababa

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: 308/005 Institutional capacity of child protection actors and resilience of communities strengthened to prepare for and respondto all emergencies in accordance with CCCs
2: Number of children enrolled in psycho-social activities
1. Number of children reached through community care structures (CCSs) to prevent and respond to sexual exploitation and abuse

baseline.value: 800 highly vulnerable children reached through 20 CCSs in Oromia, 8,000 children in Dollo Ado

title.narrative: 3: Number of separation of children and unaccompanied minors documented and provided with family based care or an appropriate alternative care service

baseline.value: Currently 2,015 children reunified or placed in alternative care in Dollo Ado
